article.title: Lockheed Martin to Provide Radar Equipment
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin MS2, Owego, New York, was awarded a firm-fixed-price, basic ordering agreement contract for a maximum $46,503,900 for radar equipment. There are no other locations of performance. Using service is U.S. Navy. The Defense Logistics Agency Aviation, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
